channel.title: Are defence bonuses 10/10 difficulty?
channel.description:
Must be; no one ever answers me. Ever.
What I'm looking to do: write a method that applies a player's defence bonuses ([6] [7] and [8], which I can add on my own) to an NPC's maxHit. My idea was using the NPC's maxHP in my method.

item.title: Are defence bonuses 10/10 difficulty?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

I’m not using the NPC’s defence bonuses. I’m lowering the NPC’s maxHit based on the PLAYER’s defence bonuses.

Read full topic

item.title: Are defence bonuses 10/10 difficulty?
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

or if u feel like taking 5 hrs out of ur day u could go into ur Item.CFG and lower the strength, crush, attack, strike, etc. bonuses? … thatd take a while… do wut zombie said and find the PvM method

Read full topic

item.title: Are defence bonuses 10/10 difficulty?
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Well if that’s what your trying to do your trying to make NPC defence which isn’t hard, but I haven’t looked at private server files in ages and I can’t tell you exactly how you do this, but I can give you a hint. Find the method that handles PvM, than just work with it from there adding different things that would give them a defence. Like defence bonuses just like they work with players.

Read full topic

item.title: Are defence bonuses 10/10 difficulty?
item.dc:creator: @pure_ess_ftw pure ess ftw
item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

[quote=“Zombiedevice, post:2, topic:278844”]Add on the the constructors:

identifier yourMethod(int HP)

I don’t really understand what your asking, your question is kind of scrambled. The NPC’s hit what their HP is?[/quote]
i think he is trying to say npc def, so you dont just keep 1 hitting monsters, or always hitting like 20+, sadly i do not know how to do this

Read full topic
